function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid and widespread virus spread despite quarantine and lockdown measures.","Impact":"Lockdown of cities and trapping of millions of people, disruption of essential supply chains, panic and hoarding behavior.","Mitigation":"Implement stricter quarantine and lockdown measures, improve virus testing and detection, educate and inform the public on proper pandemic response.","Technologies":"Virus testing kits, contact tracing technology, public health communication tools.","People":"Residents of the locked down cities, individuals at risk of hoarding behavior, general public at risk of panic and fear.","Owner":"Government authorities, public health agencies, city officials."}]}
